decrypt-maven-plugin
Decrypt Maven Plugin
Last Published: 2016-01-28  | Version: 0.1.1

Quick Start

To use the plugin, first declare the plugin in your pom.xml:

<plugin>
    <groupId>com.github.davidmoten</groupId>
    <artifactId>decrypt-maven-plugin</artifactId>
    <version>[plugin version]</version>
    <configuration>
        <serverId>container</serverId>
        <outputFile>${project.build.directory}/pass.txt</outputFile>
    </configuration>
</plugin>

To run:

mvn decrypt:decrypt
